archimate:DataObject.name: HESA Award Type
archimate:DataObject.documentation:
HESA number
Needed in target product
See HESA definition - e.g. 01 is a foundation degree etc. Goes up to 25
Autocalculated - normally via mapping table
Should not be manually maintained
E.g. PGR, PGT, UG, Foundation degree, Other (diplomas)
